title: Syllabus as per Lab
text:
Laboratory Component: Experiments:
• Photoelectric effect
• Single Slit Diffraction
• Newton's Ring
• Pohl's Pendulum
• Double Slit Diffraction (NOT IN SYLLABUS)
• Coupled Pendula
• Polarimetry
• Transverse and Longitudinal Waves
• Prism Spectrometer (NOT IN SYLLABUS)
• Michelson Interferometer
• Diffraction Grating Error Analysis, Measuring Scales, Instruments and Related Topics are also there.

title: Student Opinion
text:
